description: Controls applications on a device such as opening, closing, minimizing, or maximizing apps.

device.description: Specifies the device on which the application should be controlled. Can be phone, PC, tablet, or laptop.

applicationControlType.description: Type of control action to perform on the application. Supported actions: open, close, minimize, maximize.

applicationName.description: The name of the application to be controlled. For example: Chrome, WhatsApp, Arduino IDE, Paint, etc.

examples: maximize the arduino on pc then open paint
